Method Detail

start

void start()
           throws EmbeddedException
Starts the instance of the NetKernel

Throws:
EmbeddedException - thrown if there is a failure of any kind during startup

stop

void stop()
          throws EmbeddedException
Stops the instance of the NetKernel

Throws:
EmbeddedException - thrown if there is a failure of any kind during shutdown

isStarted

boolean isStarted()
Checks whether the NetKernel instance is running

Returns:
true if the instance is started, false if not

requestResource

java.lang.Object requestResource(java.net.URI aURI,
                                 java.lang.Class aResponseClass,
                                 RequestArgs aArgs)
                                 throws EmbeddedException
Request the sourcing of a resource with the given URI and arguments passed by value

Parameters:
aURI - the URI of the resource to request
aResponseClass - the class of aspect to return.
aArgs - The set of any pass-by-value arguments to the request, may be null
Returns:
an IURAspect that implements the response class
Throws:
EmbeddedException - thrown if we fail to process the request for any reason including the instance not being started and the URI not being resolvable.

requestRepresentation

IURRepresentation requestRepresentation(java.net.URI aURI,
                                        java.lang.Class aResponseClass,
                                        RequestArgs aArgs)
                                        throws EmbeddedException
Throws:
EmbeddedException

setLogging

void setLogging(int aLevel,
                boolean aEnabled)
Set the logging level of the NetKernel instance

Parameters:
aLevel - one of the constant logging levels defined (LOG_LEVEL_*)
aEnabled - true or false to enable or disable logging

getClassloader

java.lang.ClassLoader getClassloader()
                                     throws EmbeddedException
Return the classloader for the context that the requests are made to. This provides a mechanism for getting classes of aspect that requests might return when they are not in the regular classpath.

Throws:
EmbeddedException
